subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] webcam ITC gallery update

full_text:

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Amy,
   
  Yep just my crappy old webcam. Ive used it with the feedback loop method, and finally took thier suggestion and did it my own way using tv as the light source. 
   
  Now I usually record about 1-2 inches away from the screen and use things like nature scenes, wildlife, or outdoors type stuff as the raw video light source. I try and steer clear of things that have people in it so I know the results were not something that could have been on screen.
   
  Misty
Amy Swanson <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
            WOW!
  Those are really freaky, some of them are quite disturbing! The one that you thought looks like a hand waving, with the face on the hand looks like a baby with a frealy one behind it.
  Just using the web cam?! AMAZING!

Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
        I updated the gallery and added some more of my images. 
   
  http://webcamitc.myphotoalbum.com/
   
  Misty
